nodes.text: Birtraub Brothers Storage and Reclamation Center

The Birtraub Brothers Storage and Reclamation Center was an immense storage center near Crovna's main spaceport. A mass of gray buildings, it served forty ships at any given time. It was a front for the criminal enterprises of the Birtraub Brothers.
The outlet on Crovna housed some of the BloodScar pirate gang's stolen items in warehouse 13 around 0.5 ABY.
